constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Hogsmill Valley Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: Condition 1 of planning permission ref. 21/00543/HOU is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:FLU 1378.05 - Proposed Elevations Rev D;FLU 1378.03 - Proposed Floor Plans Rev D; and,FLU.1378.01 - Existing and Proposed Site Layout and Location Plans Rev B.Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 21/00543/HOU (Demolition of existing conservatory and erection of two storey side/rear extension). Amendment to consist of addition of two windows on rear elevation and regularisation of position of rooflight (shown correctly on the approved site plan, but incorrectly on the approved floor plans)
